alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:13PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson County through 500 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walkerville, or 8 miles north of Butte, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boulder, Basin, Wickes, Elkhorn State Park and Elk Park. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 134 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
